cause.description:
Join the American Lung Association of Florida - Central Area at Blue Jacket Park in the Baldwin Park Area for a short walk to support children with asthma and their families. The walk will be held on September 15, 2007, with registration starting at 8 a.m. and the walk at 9 a.m. For additional information on our "Blow the Whistle on Asthma" Asthma Walk, please call 407-425-5864
1. Asthma is a chronic condition affecting millions of Americans and many in Florida.
2. Over 12 billion is spent annually to keep Asthma under control.
3. Over 24 million Americans suffer from Asthma.
cause.mission: To make an impact and raise funds to support the estimated 22 million Americans who currently suffer from asthma through Education, Research, and Advocacy.
cause.name: Orlando Asthma Walk
